alert.note: Alert for Desha; Drew (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued January 31 at 3:17PM CST until February 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...An additional round of freezing rain and sleet are expected this afternoon through Wednesday morning, with another round Wednesday afternoon through Thursday. Overall ice accruals should be between one quarter to one half inch. Sleet accumulations should be less than a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Arkansas. * WHEN...Until noon Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. An Ice Storm Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Significant amounts of ice accumulations will make travel dangerous or impossible. Travel is strongly discouraged. Commerce will likely be severely impacted. If you must travel...keep an extra flashlight...food...and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Ice accumulations and winds will likely lead to snapped power lines and falling tree branches that add to the danger.
